name: relatedfilesbygit
description: Search related files by git history for opened document. Need to set repository path. Mac os: shift+cmd+j, Win: ctrl+alt+j

relatedfilesbygit.repositoryPath.description: Path to repository on your computer

relatedfilesbygit.historyDepth.description: Last commits for searching related files

relatedfilesbygit.maxCommitFilesAmount.description: If commit contains too much files, possibly they are not related

relatedfilesbygit.alternateExtensions.description: Search this instead of origin file (if need)

relatedfilesbygit.basicExtension.description: Basic Extension if need to search renamed (e.g. if no .js, search .ts)
